description: The symptom presents itself as a failure in the Windows Update process, primarily indicated by the error codes 0x8024401c, 0x8024002d, 0x8007000d, and 0x80073701. These codes signify issues that prevent non-compliant devices from successfully downloading and installing updates. System administrators might encounter these error messages on devices running Windows 10, requiring troubleshooting steps such as stopping the Windows Update service, renaming the Software Distribution folder, and executing commands for system repair and update installation.
